definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

pinyin: lei4 bi2 ju1 dan1 xi4 bao1

sentences.english: Yeast is a single-celled organism and therefore less complex to study for initial screening purposes.
sentences.chinese: 选择酵母是因为酵母是单细胞生物，便于研究。

sentences.english: Every human spent about half an hour as a single cell.
sentences.chinese: 每个人作为单细胞生存的时间约为半小时。

sentences.english: The common-ancestral selves were unicellular, whereas the animal lineage has elected to construct multicellular selves.
sentences.chinese: 祖先本身是单细胞的，然而动物进化成多细胞。

sentences.english: The improved embryonic array realizes tolerance with cell-elimination.
sentences.chinese: 改进后的胚胎阵列采用单细胞替换法实现容错。

sentences.english: The female archesporium differentiates from the single cell under the epidermis of nucellus.
sentences.chinese: 雌性孢原处于珠心表皮之下，为单细胞。

sentences.english: Glands may consist of only single cells that make mucus.
sentences.chinese: 外分泌腺可以仅由制造粘液的单细胞组成。

sentences.english: Nonetheless, there are indications that single-celled organisms can learn.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，仍有迹象表明单细胞有机体可以学习。

sentences.english: An autotrophic unicellular green alga presents the minimum of specialization.
sentences.chinese: 一个自养的单细胞绿藻表现最小程度的特化。

sentences.english: How do unicellular organisms find food and avoid noxious substances?
sentences.chinese: 单细胞生物如何寻找食物和避免有毒物质？

sentences.english: Dinoflagellates are single-celled and primitive marine organisms.
sentences.chinese: 沟鞭藻为单细胞的原始的海洋生物。

sentences.english: Unicellular planktonic groups form the basis of the food chain in the deep sea.
sentences.chinese: 单细胞浮游生物是形成深海食物链的基础。

sentences.english: After all, these single-cell fungi don’t make blood vessels.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，这些单细胞的真菌并不会生成血管。

sentences.english: Dinoflagellates are microscopic single – celled organisms .
sentences.chinese: 腰鞭毛虫是细微的单细胞生物。

sentences.english: A small, typically one-celled, prokaryotic micro - organism.
sentences.chinese: 一种很小的，以单细胞为特点的原核微生物。

sentences.english: Our single-celled ancestors reproduced by dividing in two.
sentences.chinese: 我们的单细胞祖先藉著一分为二的分裂方式来繁殖。

sentences.english: I think single-cell organisms are possible within two years.
sentences.chinese: 我认为两年内制造出单细胞生物是可能的。
